reviews.review_msg: One of the most genuinely nice people I've encountered, professor or otherwise. Very passionate about not only the subject matter, but her students as well and very receptive to feedback. Uses humour and real life examples to make the content more relatable. Very personable and approachable. I'd take any class Lara was teaching!

Shes super friendly, and very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. Receptive to student feedback, always checking in and asking for suggestions and concern. Young, fresh, and full of charisma , keeps lectures light and interesting.

Lara is one of the best profs I've ever had. She makes lectures fun, and really helps you understand the material. I actually looked forward to her 3 hour lectures because of this. I would definitely take a class with her again!
Pretty good prof! Records the lecture and posts them online just in case you missed anything. Very clear and organized. Includes videos and tons of other information.
